sys_script_include.description: Script Include to return an email address. The calling client-side script passes a sys_id for a User table record.
sys_script_include.name: GetEmailAddress

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_e96aeb5747a3111018579a62736d43ba
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit. GetEmailAddress</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Script Include to return an email address. The calling client-side script passes a sys_id for a User table record.</description><name> GetEmailAddress</name><script><![CDATA[var  GetEmailAddress = Class.create();
// Extend AbstracAjaxProcessor class
GetEmailAdress.prototype = 
Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	// Define getEmail function
	// Create a GlideRecord for the User table
	// Use the sysparm_userID passed from client side to retrieve a record from User table
	// Return the email address for the requested record
	getEmail: function() {
		var userRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
		userRecord.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_userID'));
		return userRecord.email + '';
	},
	type: 'GetEmailAddress'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-09 11:08:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>e96aeb5747a3111018579a62736d43ba</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name> GetEmailAddress</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e96aeb5747a3111018579a62736d43ba</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-09 11:08:28</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
